message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_EMAIL_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of the primary email address has passed

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEMAIL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New email addresses cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEMAIL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Email Addresses of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEMAIL_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Email addresses for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEMAIL_XFV_EMAILTYPE_EMAILADDRESS
message.locale: An email type must be specified when the email address is specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEMAIL_XFV_EMAILADDRESS_EMAILTYPE
message.locale: An email address must be specified when email type is specified.
